marklogic.body:
Children, allow me to express my views wrt China.
Maybe it'll take over the world, maybe it won't.
If it does, the world might be a better place but again it might not.
All will be revealed in due course so there's no point speculating. Nobody's got a crystal ball so all we have to go on is the past.
Recall the fear in people wrt 1997 and the returning of Hong Kong to Chinese rule? Many thought Hong Kong would be finished, free market society would come to an end.
Even with the collapse of the Tiger economies in 1998, SARS in 2003 as well as Avian Flu, Hong Kong survived the lot and is flourishing as ever before.
Time will tell, just watch this space.
